title: Alex Rider: Secret Weapon: Seven Untold Adventures From the Life of a Teenaged Spy
description: International bestseller Anthony Horowitz's short story collection expands the universe of teen spy Alex Rider with more thrilling action, espionage, and pulse-pounding heroics. Contains a combination of new and previously published material, together for the first time!Inspired by his millions of fans worldwide, #1 New York Times bestselling author Anthony Horowitz is giving his loyal readers a collection of stories featuring the world's greatest teen spy, including never-before-published missions. Can Alex manage to infiltrate and disarm the secret mountainside hideout of a terrorist organization in Afghanistan? How about protecting those around him from assassins at a ski resort during the Christmas holiday? With his trademark knack for crafting stories of suspense and danger, Anthony Horowitz raises these questions and more in this collection for existing fans of Alex Rider -- and just as equally for those new to the series.
author: Anthony Horowitz
